title: Teen Found Shot In The Head, Police Investigate Shooting
content:
PHILADELPHIA (CBS) — Philadelphia police are investigate a shooting after a teen was found shot in the head this afternoon in Kensington.
Officials say police responded to the 2100 block of Firth Street at 2:38 p.m and found a 15-year-old male with a gunshot wound to the right side of his head.
He was transported to Temple Hospital where he’s listed in critical condition.
Police say an arrest has been made and a gun has been recovered. Authorities continue to investigate a motive for the shooting.
